description.en:
She is an illegitimate child of a count and is always careful not to tarnish her family's name. Since childhood, she has a secret that no one knows, and that is everytime she goes to sleep, her soul leaves her body and wanders around ─ she can control and enjoy this ability of hers. One night at the ball, she got involved into an unpleasant situation with the Duke, and as she wanders around that night, she was accidentally sucked into a teddy bear which the Duke owned...

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/td12), [Bookcube](https://www.bookcube.com/toon/detail.asp?webtoon_num=220143), [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/8123), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59209723), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/dukes_teddy_bear), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000052175), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8380974), [Peanutoon](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/7335)

**Official Translations:**
* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/romance/the-dukes-teddy-bear/list?title_no=4330)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/the-dukes-teddy-bear/list?title_no=4309)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/93286)
* [Chinese / 中文](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12311/)
description.fr:
Marshall Radiance, une jeune fille noble, connaît un grave accident en étant enfant. Or, cet accident s'avère être une chance pour elle car depuis, elle est capable de détacher son âme de son corps et de posséder différents êtres. Cependant, son pouvoir est soumis à certaines contraintes et elle ne l'utilise que comme un passe-temps nocturne. Un jour, invitée au palais impérial pour une fête, Marshall entreprend sa balade nocturne habituelle mais tout se tourne mal lorsque son âme se fait capturer par un objet étrange: Un ours en peluche! Dans la panique elle apprend une autre nouvelle encore plus effrayante... le propriétaire de la peluche est le Duc Ludvillian, prénommé «le Mur de Glace.» Parviendra-t-elle à survivre dans le corps d'une peluche et d'échapper au soupçon du Duc?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/td12), [Bookcube](https://www.bookcube.com/toon/detail.asp?webtoon_num=220143), [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/8123), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59209723), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/dukes_teddy_bear), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000052175), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8380974), [Peanutoon](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/7335)

**Official Translations:**
* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/romance/the-dukes-teddy-bear/list?title_no=4330)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/the-dukes-teddy-bear/list?title_no=4309)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/93286)
description.id:
Marshall yang pernah jatuh saat kecil, memiliki kemampuan di mana jiwanya bisa berkeliling saat dia tidur. Dia juga bisa merasuki manusia dan hewan. Tapi suatu hari, dia tiba-tiba terjebak dalam boneka teddy bear, dan pemiliknya adalah Duke yang sedingin es?!

---
Marshall, anak haram Count. Agar tidak mencoreng nama keluarga bergengsi, dia memiliki rahasia yang tidak bisa dia ceritakan. Artinya, jika Anda tidur, jiwa meninggalkan tubuh! Marshall menikmati fenomena aneh ini secara positif setelah kecelakaan yang dideritanya sebagai seorang anak, dan selanjutnya memperoleh kemampuan untuk memiliki. Kemudian, suatu hari, di sebuah pesta untuk memperingati gencatan senjata di Istana Kekaisaran, dia terlibat dalam situasi yang tidak menyenangkan dengan panglima militer, Duke Ludvillian, yang disebut 'Ice of the Empire'...

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/td12), [Bookcube](https://www.bookcube.com/toon/detail.asp?webtoon_num=220143), [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/8123), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59209723), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/dukes_teddy_bear), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000052175), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8380974), [Peanutoon](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/7335)

description.uk:
Вона - незаконнонароджена дитина графа і завжди намагається не заплямувати ім'я своєї сім'ї. З дитинства вона має секрет, який ніхто не знає, і це щоразу, коли вона лягає спати, її душа залишає тіло і блукає навколо - вона може контролювати і насолоджуватися своєю здатністю. Якось увечері на балу вона потрапила в неприємну ситуацію з герцогом, і коли вона бродила тієї ночі, її випадково засмоктало в плюшевого ведмедика, який належав герцогу.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/td12), [Bookcube](https://www.bookcube.com/toon/detail.asp?webtoon_num=220143), [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/8123), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59209723), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/dukes_teddy_bear), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000052175), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8380974), [Peanutoon](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/7335)

description.zh-hk:
伯爵的私生子馬歇爾。

為了不給名門的名聲抹黑，忍氣吞聲生活的她，有個不能說的秘密。

就是只要一睡覺靈魂就會脫離身體！

馬歇爾積極享受童年經歷的事故後發生的這一奇特現象，連年齡附身的能力都掌握在手。

有一天，她不得已出席了皇宮停戰紀念派對，與被稱為"帝國的冰牆"的軍隊總司令魯德維利安公爵發生了不愉快的情況...

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/td12), [Bookcube](https://www.bookcube.com/toon/detail.asp?webtoon_num=220143), [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/8123), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59209723), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/dukes_teddy_bear), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000052175), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8380974), [Peanutoon](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/7335)
